channel.title: [PI] Succesfully added Hiscores, but little problem! Repp++
channel.description:
Yo i setted up Hiscores correct, with phpmyadmin shitzel and mysql
but when i start source it says this:
[img]http://i42.servimg.com/u/f42/16/52/06/54/hiscor10.png[/img]
*EDIT
I think i found the problem! I cant upload my hiscores.sql to my phpmyadmin, because the upload limit is 2kb
and my hiscores.sql is a littlebit bigger, -.-
anyone knows how to make this a littlebit smaller, or where to get another hiscores.sql
this is what the phpmyadmin says:
Request-URI Too Large
The requested URL's length exceeds the capacity limit for this server.
